long: Meaning: an "extremity".  Usage: × after, border, brim, brink, edge, end, (in-) finite, frontier, outmost coast, quarter, shore, (out-) side, × some, ut(-ter-) most (part).  Source: or (negative only) "קֵצֶה"; from "H7096"; (used in a great variety of applications and idioms; compare "H7093")
